attributes.action: Re open Atherton police station , Greater Manchester
attributes.background: With crime rates rising rapidly in the local area , and no where near enough policing to cope with these issues , I believe the re opening of Atherton Police Station on a full time basis should be very carefully looked into and Some type of temporary measures put into place.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Local police services are the responsibility of your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner. You can contact your local PCC here:

http://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/ 

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228088
